title: The anti-fatigue and sleep-aiding effects vary significantly among different recipes containing Ganoderma lucidum extracts
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Kexin Li, Wenzhen Liu, Changhui Wu, Le Wang, Yunmei Huang, Ye Li, Huimin Zheng, Yanyu Shang, Lei Zhang, Zhuo Chen
